name: polling(systemCode:requestCode:timeSlot:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends the Polling command as defined by FeliCa card specification to the tag.Required.
declaration:
func polling(systemCode: Data, 
 requestCode: NFCFeliCaPollingRequestCode, 
    timeSlot: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot, 
completionHandler: @escaping (Data, Data, Error?) -> Void)
